data.text: When visiting a great city like @PortlandGov for #3CMAAnnual, I believe there might be a legal requirement to take a #CityHallSelfie https://t.co/T3yhcEBpRM
#SGRV #CityHallSelfie, where @RonHolifield is visiting the City of Windsor, CT's Town Manager Peter Souza, a friend & colleague. https://t.co/2olXcwmbLj
#SGRV #CityHallSelfie where @RonHolifield stopped in on the City of Hartford, CT's Chief Operating Officer Thea Montañez! https://t.co/jnkBiyuvRM
RT @StrategicGovt: #SGRV #CityHallSelfie from the Town of Wethersfield, CT where Ron stopped in to visit with Town Manager Frederick Presle…

#SGRV #CityHallSelfie from the Town of Wethersfield, CT where Ron stopped in to visit with Town Manager Frederick Presley, one of the most innovative-thinking managers in the nation. https://t.co/cQGOelm6wV
RT @StrategicGovt: #SGRV #CityHallSelfie from @RonHolifield on the road, this time in front of Rocky Hill, CT Town Hall where he met with H…

#SGRV #CityHallSelfie from @RonHolifield on the road, this time in front of Rocky Hill, CT Town Hall where he met with HR Dir Dana McGee & her team. Rocky Hill is a beautiful, historical community that SGR is currently doing their Town Manager search for! https://t.co/vHQKzr58XS https://t.co/lVXjqdnIym

My mom and I (and 2 of the furballs) took a quick trip to ME, NH, and VT. It was a bittersweet getaway as we made some of my dad's favorite stops. 
The pups took their own version of a  #cityhallselfie in @townofconway after hiking @WhiteMountainNF. https://t.co/qeVxMW16Z9
RT @PhilKiraly: Just a few folks out there taking a @CityHallSelfie in the  @VGlencoe Village Hall #pollinatorgarden... @ILCMA @ELGL50 @ICMA
RT @BriannaSunryd: The tower is so tall on @Gloucester_MA 2nd empire brick city hall built in 1870, I spotted her from out in the harbor an…
RT @BriannaSunryd: I wouldn’t dream of leaving this little gem out of the #CityHallSelfie collection today. Built in 1727, this was the @To…

I wouldn’t dream of leaving this little gem out of the #CityHallSelfie collection today. Built in 1727, this was the @TownofMHD Town Hall until it was replaced by Abbot Hall circa 1876 🇺🇸 https://t.co/21h0fTKpM7

The tower is so tall on @Gloucester_MA 2nd empire brick city hall built in 1870, I spotted her from out in the harbor and had to solicit help from my Schooner Festival crew for this #CityHallSelfie to fit it all in https://t.co/LwQlmBPurK

users.name: Marnie Schubert
users.description: Community Services Director for @TOQC_official; current President of @3CMA; on a mission for adventure! Thoughts are my own.

users.name: SGR
users.description: SGR (Strategic Government Resources) partners with local governments to Recruit, Assess, and Develop Innovative, Collaborative, Authentic Leaders.

users.name: Amie Hendrix
users.description: City Manager and proud board member of @ELGL50. Tweets of my pups, runs, sports, local gov, theater, & more. Views are my own.

users.name: ELGL
users.description:
ELGL is the Engaging Local Government Leaders network. We ❤️ @govlovepodcast #LocalGov #CityHallSelfie #ELGL22 #ELGLKnope 

Join ELGL community!🥳https://t.co/P5PoSsaU1e

users.name: Brianna Sunryd
users.description: Director of Comms & Civic Innovation @TownofAmherst | @UmassAmherst & @UmassPolicy Grad | @TweetWorcester Alum | #CX #HCD #LocalGov #CivicTech #GovTech

tweets.text: #SGRV #CityHallSelfie from the Town of Wethersfield, CT where Ron stopped in to visit with Town Manager Frederick Presley, one of the most innovative-thinking managers in the nation. https://t.co/cQGOelm6wV

#SGRV #CityHallSelfie from @RonHolifield on the road, this time in front of Rocky Hill, CT Town Hall where he met with HR Dir Dana McGee & her team. Rocky Hill is a beautiful, historical community that SGR is currently doing their Town Manager search for! https://t.co/vHQKzr58XS https://t.co/lVXjqdnIym
Just a few folks out there taking a @CityHallSelfie in the  @VGlencoe Village Hall #pollinatorgarden... @ILCMA @ELGL50 @ICMA https://t.co/SM0Ab4vinf

The tower is so tall on @Gloucester_MA 2nd empire brick city hall built in 1870, I spotted her from out in the harbor and had to solicit help from my Schooner Festival crew for this #CityHallSelfie to fit it all in https://t.co/LwQlmBPurK

I wouldn’t dream of leaving this little gem out of the #CityHallSelfie collection today. Built in 1727, this was the @TownofMHD Town Hall until it was replaced by Abbot Hall circa 1876 🇺🇸 https://t.co/21h0fTKpM7
